ing: 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "A surprisingly zesty dip, delicious with fruits and vegetables. The flavors of the apples and horseradish are highlighted by pumpkin pie spice and lemon."
ins: Mix the fat free ranch dressing, grated apple, horseradish, pumpkin pie spice, lemon juice and pepper in a medium sized serving bowl and chill until serving.
